name: wikidata-highlight
description: Extract entities from a webpage and find them on wikidata

scripts.ner: if test "$NER" = "js" ; then node ner.js ; else python ner.py ; fi
scripts.extract: if test "$EXTRACT" = "python" ; then python extract.py ; else node extract.js ; fi
scripts.search: if test "$SEARCH" = "wikipedia" ; then node search_wikipedia.js ; else node search_wikidata.js ; fi
